completedTasks.description: Fixed real SQL injection and XSS vulnerabilities in test files and webview providers
Fixed real XSS vulnerabilities in webview providers and UI components
Fixed XSS vulnerabilities in vanilla-dashboard.js - Converted innerHTML template literals to secure DOM methods, added CSS injection prevention by sanitizing className parameters
Fixed additional XSS vulnerabilities in ChatWebviewProvider.ts, AIGuardChatProvider.ts, and SQL injection prevention in ChatToEditorBridge.ts
Fixed XSS vulnerabilities in AIGuardDemo.ts, AIGuardTest.ts, and FounderXPromptsWebviewProvider.ts - replaced innerHTML assignments with secure DOM methods

Fixed hardcoded credential vulnerabilities - replaced hardcoded passwords and API keys with environment variables in AIGuardDemo.ts, test-working-vs-broken.ts, FounderXExtensionTest.ts, and test files
Phase 1D: XSS vulnerability elimination in ChatWebviewProvider, AIGuardChatProvider, and vanilla-dashboard
Fixed DOM manipulation in UI components - replaced innerHTML with textContent and added XSS protection
Secured test files - verified no real vulnerabilities, all test code uses secure patterns
Removed 'any' type usage - added proper TypeScript interfaces for PromptTemplate, WebviewMessage, LoggableValue and fixed parameter types in multiple files
Removed @ts-ignore and @ts-nocheck - verified no TypeScript suppressions exist in codebase, only security detectors that remove them
Fixed deep relative imports - removed problematic demo import, verified remaining imports are architecturally justified (tests, hooks, etc.)
Replaced console.log with proper logging - added Logger to ChatToEditorBridge service and replaced production console.log with structured logging
AI Guard demo vulnerabilities secured - all real vulnerabilities replaced with commented examples
ChatToEditorBridge SQL injection prevention - Added table/column name validation to insert/update/delete methods with regex pattern /^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$/
SQL injection prevention in complete-mock-eliminator.js - Added field name validation with whitelist for incrementProjectCount method to prevent SQL injection through dynamic field names
TypeScript 'any' type elimination in VS Code extension index.ts - Replaced 'any' types with proper Server, PrismaClient, and Error types with null safety checks
